title: HOUR 2 - Right & Wrong, Mike Silver
itunes:title: HOUR 2 - Right & Wrong, Mike Silver
description:
In this hour of The Herd with Colin Cowherd, it's another installment of Where Colin Was Right, Where Colin Was Wrong. Plus, Mike Silver--longtime NFL journalist and friend of The Herd--stops by to offer his reaction to the weekend's playoff games. Finally, Colin lays out when analytics are appropriate and useful--and when one should go with their gut. 

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
